languages.text: "Добывающий мир? Как по мне — грязная, негостеприимная дыра, где "свободные" верноподданные веками горбатятся в недрах шахт. Обычно — до смерти".
"A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."
languages.original_text: "Добывающий мир? Как по мне — грязная, негостеприимная дыра, где "свободные" верноподданные веками горбатятся в недрах шахт. Обычно — до смерти".

traits.locale_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."
"A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."
"A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."
"A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

languages.text: « Un monde minier ? On dirait plutôt un cloaque inhospitalier où de loyaux sujets travaillent "librement" dans des puits insondables, siècle après siècle. Jusqu'à leur mort, la plupart du temps. »
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

traits.locale_text: « Un monde minier ? On dirait plutôt un cloaque inhospitalier où de loyaux sujets travaillent "librement" dans des puits insondables, siècle après siècle. Jusqu'à leur mort, la plupart du temps. »

languages.text: “矿业世界？在我看来，那就是一个环境恶劣的破地洞，忠实的臣民在深不见底的矿井中‘自由地’劳作，百年之后又百年，直到彻底咽气。”
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

traits.locale_text: “矿业世界？在我看来，那就是一个环境恶劣的破地洞，忠实的臣民在深不见底的矿井中‘自由地’劳作，百年之后又百年，直到彻底咽气。”

languages.text: 「マイニングワールド？アタシには、不潔で人を寄せ付けない穴蔵で、忠実な臣民が何世紀にもわたって底なしの坑道で『自由に』、そして大抵は死ぬまで労働している場所にしか思えないね」
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

traits.locale_text: 「マイニングワールド？アタシには、不潔で人を寄せ付けない穴蔵で、忠実な臣民が何世紀にもわたって底なしの坑道で『自由に』、そして大抵は死ぬまで労働している場所にしか思えないね」

languages.text: "Eine Bergbauwelt? Das scheint mir ein unwirtliches Drecksloch zu sein, in dem treue Untertanen 'frei' in endlos tiefen Minenschächten schuften, Jahrhundert für Jahrhundert. Meist bis zum Tod."
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Bergbauwelt? Das scheint mir ein unwirtliches Drecksloch zu sein, in dem treue Untertanen 'frei' in endlos tiefen Minenschächten schuften, Jahrhundert für Jahrhundert. Meist bis zum Tod."

languages.text: «¿Un mundo minero? A mí me parece un agujero infecto e inhóspito donde sus fieles súbditos trabajan "libremente" siglo tras siglo en galerías de profundidad incalculable. Y luego mueren».
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un mundo minero? A mí me parece un agujero infecto e inhóspito donde sus fieles súbditos trabajan "libremente" siglo tras siglo en galerías de profundidad incalculable. Y luego mueren».

languages.text: "Bir maden dünya mı? Bana göre bu; sadık tebaasının 'özgürce' dipten dibe uzanan maden şaftlarında genellikle ölene kadar yüzyıllarca çalıştığı, pis, yaşanmaz bir delik."
languages.original_text: "A mining world? It looks to me like a filthy, inhospitable hole where loyal subjects 'freely' toil in fathomless mine shafts century after century. Usually until death."
